concept.title: What is Division?
concept.shortdesc: To explain what it is that you are doing when you use the JPS division feature.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of dividing numbers, you should know what division is. "Division" is a mathematical concept in which you calculate the number of times a number is contained in another number.
So, the purpose of division is to divide a number into another number to find the quotient.
The obelus (รท) symbol represents division of numbers.
This same symbol is used in the app to represent division; therefore, it will complete the task of dividing numbers.
